definition: to get rid of/to put aside/to reject/to keep control/to hold (one's breath)

sentences.english: The lacquered screen that tells the history of a clan of scholars?
sentences.chinese: 能告诉人们一派雅士传奇的漆质屏风？

sentences.english: In a corner of the room behind a screen was a small gas stove and a refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 在房间一个角落的屏风后有一个小煤气灶和一台冰箱。

sentences.english: From this corridor the visitor looks through carved marble screens to a central room.
sentences.chinese: 从廊道游者可以穿过雕花大理石屏风直接看到里屋。

sentences.english: Beyond the illusionary screen, summer heat is billowing.
sentences.chinese: 幻觉的屏风之外，夏天，热浪滚滚。

sentences.english: A screen separated her bed from the rest of her one-room apartment.
sentences.chinese: 屏风把她的床与单间公寓的其他部位隔开来。

sentences.english: The best way to accomplish this is with a room divider or screen.
sentences.chinese: 完成这个的最好办法是用一个空间分隔器或者屏风。

sentences.english: The toilet door to door for wealth, leakage curtilage, usable screen keep out.
sentences.chinese: 厕所门正对大门，为漏财退运之宅，可用屏风遮挡。

sentences.english: Screen top painting is"the old Beijing overpass eight weird"rich Beijing characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 屏风上面画的是“老北京天桥八怪”富有北京特色。

sentences.english: The sitting room was spaced by a screen.
sentences.chinese: 起居室用一面屏风分成了两小间。

sentences.english: Screen as an integral part of traditional furniture goes back to ancient history.
sentences.chinese: 屏风作为传统家具中不可或缺的部分历史渊远。

sentences.english: Mrs Tremaine caught hold of the screen and swung it aside.
sentences.chinese: 屈里曼太太抓住了屏风，把它甩到一边去。

sentences.english: Candle flowers cover the small screen long.
The bamboo gentleman once circulars a screen, gentle moncler jackets softly bathe small put on the mattress.
sentences.chinese: 竹君绕过屏风，温柔地把沐小小放在床上。

sentences.english: A steel wire screen above the office's credenza .
sentences.chinese: 一张钢丝屏风悬挂在办公室的书柜之上。

sentences.english: Soon, Jeremy heard the screen door slam.
sentences.chinese: 一会，杰瑞米听到屏风砰地一声被关上。

sentences.english: One of us misses catching the screen door. It slams.
sentences.chinese: 不知是谁失了手，屏风门“砰”地一声关上了。

definition: spirit wall (screen wall used to shield an entrance in traditional Chinese architecture)
hanging screen/curtain over shop door (for privacy and serving as advertisement)
a screen wall across the gate of a house (for privacy)
